conbody.p: The servers are started and stopped as Windows Services and can be found in the Service Listing in the format <domain_name>_<server_name>. The default server logging from this service gets placed in the file <WebLogic Install directory>/<domain_repository>/<domain_name>/<node.name>/servers/<server.name>/logs/<server.name>_Redirect.log. This log gets cleared upon server start-up.
